notes.text:
Now, this is a real deck, I used it from legend 3 to kog plus from plat to legend 2. I am a good dino duelist so for me its might have been easier to reach KOG. 

Normally, I dont get KOG this early in the season but I got triggered from a tourney and did this run with dinos in legend  3 went 5-0.

Dinos are actually good, people sleep on them. Not top tier but still viable with the backrow in this slow meta. Dino channel for more discussion.  I do have another secret build which is good.

Thanks to @tekumse - Dino Expert for listening to my stupid ideas haha. I apologise.
